snippet: If approved by the Senate, Antonio Weiss, the global head of investment banking at Lazard and a significant donor to the Democratic party, would oversee the Treasury Department’s work on fiscal policy and operations.
abstract: If approved by the Senate, Antonio Weiss, the global head of investment banking at Lazard and a significant donor to the Democratic party, would oversee the Treasury Department’s work on fiscal policy and operations.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: White House Nominates Lazard Banker to Treasury Post
